about.introduction: Hello! I'm Megumi, a passionate Frontend developer, born and brought up in Japan and based in Germany.
about.development1: I'm an enthusiastic web developer with an eye for detail and I specialize in JavaScript and React and I can easily familiarize myself with any programming language or framework.
about.development2: I started my career as a Frontend engineer at web designing and consulting company in Japan in 2020 then joined the Ironhack Web Development Bootcamp in Amsterdam in 2021.
about.development3: My extensive programming experience makes me comfortable to develop and work on both Frontend and Backend build product from scratch.
about.twist1: I've lived multiple countries for studing and working and I enjoyed developing social and communicating. My time abroad has taught me to be a true team player and adaptive with those who have different backgrounds.
about.twist2: Talking about personality, I love traveling, handicraft, calligraphy and learning German and Korean.
about.conclusion: Checkout my <1>Resume<1/>, my <3>Github<3/>, or let's chat on <5>Linkedin<5/>.

project_kittchat.description: Kittchat is a cat cafe website that makes a reservation by choosing from 5 different locations in Berlin.<1 />Once you sign up, you can manage and check reservation history from your personal account.

project_animeek.description: Animeek is an app where you can search for your favorite anime and be able to add it to your watchlist. <1 />You just type any anime you desire and Animeek will give you all the information you need.

project_coingame.description: Coin-Collector is a game about collecting two types of coins which fall from top to bottom.<1/>An enemy of the devil is also coming from the right side to reduce your points.<3 />When you cannot avoid rocks, the game is over.

project_feuille.description: This is a jewelry E-commercethe website landing page.<1 />You can check the item detail when you click an image and when you scroll down, you can check shop detail with Google Maps.
